title: Web Information
description: Information about a web interaction recorded via an `ExperienceEvent`, including the web page, referrer and/or link related to the interaction.

xdm:webPage.title: Web Page
xdm:webPage.description: Details about the web page where the web interaction occurred.

xdm:webLink.title: Web Link
xdm:webLink.description: Details about the web link (URL) that corresponds to the web page where the interaction occurred.

xdm:webReferrer.title: Web Referrer
xdm:webReferrer.description: The referrer of a web interaction, which is the URL a visitor came from immediately before the current web interaction was recorded.
